basics.name: Steven Stephenson
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: From leading & kerning to polymorphism & encapsulation, I have a strong passion for design and development. I've earned a  Master of Science in Applied Information Technology from Towson University as well as a Bachelors degree in Visual Communication and Digital Media Arts from Bowie State University.  In between working on design and development projects, I find time to paint, http://www.imagekind.com/artists/SC_Stephenson.

work.summary: idfive is an integrated marketing firm for brands on a mission. Based in Baltimore, MD, we solve marketing and web-based problems for clients primarily in higher education, not-for-profit, and health.
highlights: Integrate designs into CMS platforms such as Drupal, WordPress, OmniUpdate, ExpressionEngine &
Developed custom web & mobile applications using various technologies including; ColdFusion, PHP, Angular and Ionic.
Build responsive websites using a mobile-first approach.
Client-side development of adaptive websites & small front-end web applications utilizing HTML5, CSS/SASS/Less, & JavaScript.
Integrating small, medium, and enterprise-level sites into various content  management systems, including WordPress, Expression Engine, Drupal, and OmniUpdate.
Designing logos, websites & printed material utilizing the Adobe Creative  Suite.

volunteer.summary: The Baltimore Intersection is a non-profit dedicated to transforming students from underserved areas into leaders.
highlights: Taught kids on the impact of art on society and how art has been used for social change through out history.
Designed various marketing collateral to promote the non-profit.

awards.title: 2013 Best In Class for The Johns Hopkins Carey Business School Website
